effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.black_white: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

flavor_text.black_white: If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
